forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 45. Northwest wind 1 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
The early afternoon sun bathes Downtown San Francisco in warmth, casting a golden hue over the cityscape. The highs will hover around 59 degrees, with a gentle west wind ushering in a crispness that feels pleasantly invigorating. The clarity of the day is stunning—sky blue stretches infinitely, unmarred by fog or the lingering veil of a marine layer. As the afternoon progresses, temperatures will dip slightly, inviting layers to ensure comfort against the cooling air.

As night descends, expect a serene twilight, giving way to a cool evening with lows around 45 degrees. A light northwest breeze will rustle the leaves, transporting whispers of the day into the nocturnal calm. For attire, consider a light jacket layered over a sweater, ideal for keeping warm during an evening stroll along the Embarcadero or a casual sit at one of the many charming cafes. The crisp air calls for a gentle exploration, perhaps a quiet walk through Golden Gate Park, where the paths are lined with towering trees and the soft sounds of nature mingle with the faint hum of the city.
